definition: to offer/to present/to dedicate/to donate/to show/to put on display/worthy person (old)

sentences.english: 73 countries reported collecting fewer than 10 donations per 1000 population.
sentences.chinese: 据73个国家报告，每千人献血不到10次。

sentences.english: Next, the participants read an article about blood donations.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，志愿者们需阅读关于献血的文章。

sentences.english: A girl told me donating blood would make her gain weight. Not true.
sentences.chinese: 有位姑娘告诉我，献血会使她的体重增加，这不正确。

sentences.english: Is my blood depress slight and anaemic can you donate blood?
sentences.chinese: 我血压低轻微贫血能献血么？

sentences.english: It's all our duty to donate blood.
Objective To know the blood quality of free blood donation in Zhangjiajie City.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解张家界市无偿献血的血液质量。

sentences.english: Non-remunerated blood donation, both for the people of today, for tomorrow we have.
sentences.chinese: 无偿献血，既为今天的别人，又为明天的我们。

sentences.english: The countdown to World Blood Donor Day (WBDD) has started.
sentences.chinese: 世界献血日倒计时已经开始。

sentences.english: Today, , I participated in the "unpaid blood donation into campus" activity.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我参加了造“无偿献血进校园”活动。

sentences.english: Many local residents are rushing to a mobile blood collection vehicle parked at a square near the site to donate blood.
sentences.chinese: 当地居民纷纷赶到工厂附近广场的移动献血车献血。

sentences.english: Many local residents are rushing to a mobile blood collection vehicle parked at a square near the site to donate blood.
sentences.chinese: 当地居民纷纷赶到工厂附近广场的移动献血车献血。

sentences.english: Physical health qualifications of blood donors shall be laid down by the department of public health under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 献血者的身体健康条件由国务院卫生行政部门规定。

sentences.english: Blood donation is good for the people, family and nation.
sentences.chinese: 无偿献血，利国利民利家。

sentences.english: I’m sure you now realize that you should donate blood.
sentences.chinese: 我相信你现在意识到你应该献血了。

sentences.english: Likewise, a person who donates blood is not in contact with the person receiving it.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，献血者也不会接触到受血者。

sentences.english: My dear friends, faced with such fact, what do you think of non-remunerated blood donation?
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的朋友们，面对如此现象，你怎么看无偿献血呢？

definition: blood generating stem cells (in bone marrow)
to take blood/to draw blood (e.g. for a test)
to donate goods (to a relief effort)/to contribute material
to check for compatibility (for an organ transplant)
to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to do a blood test/to have one's blood tested
